titles.title: Providing for the printing of a collection of statements made in tribute to the late Justice Thurgood Marshall.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Manton moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/27/1993--Passed House amended. Provides for the printing of a collection of statements made in tribute to the late Justice Thurgood Marshall, together with related materials, as a House Document.
